metadata.dc:title: Comparative study about angle variation and radius bend of two instrumentation techniques: ProFile y ProTaper
metadata.dc:description: Numerous different techniques and instruments exist to clean and shape the root canal system, but none of them guarantee an ideal preparation, especially in curved canals. In this studied we compared two Ni-Ti rotary instrumentation, with different designs: PROFILE and PROTAPER. The objective was to evaluate the variation of the curvature angle and radius, to determine the apical transportation, the time required for shaping of canals and the number of separated files. The results showed that both systems reducted the angle and increase the radius of curvature, being more evident in the Protaper system(statistically significant difference). Protaper group bad significant more transportation, both in mesial and clinical view. Although Protaper group was faster, no significant differences were found. metadata.dc:description: Existen numerosas técnicas e instrumentos destinados a limpiar y conformar el sistema de conductos radiculares, pero ninguno garantiza una preparación ideal, especialmente en conductos curvos. En nuestro estudio comparamos dos sistemas de instrumentación mecánica de Ni-Ti con diseños diferentes: Profile y Protaper con el objetivo de valorar la variación del ángulo y del radio de curvatura, determinar el transporte apical, calcular el tiempo requerido para la conformación de los conductos y determinar el número de fracturas de las limas. Como resultados obtuvimos que con ambos sistemas se produjo una disminución del ángulo y un aumento del radio siendo más marcado en el sistema de instrumentación protaper.
